short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The single best extension for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wanted to see your favourite faces appear all over chrome, well now you can! 

You may be familiar with the brilliant Chrome extension known as nCage, which replaces all images on webpages with pictures of the esteemed American actor Nicholas Cage. I am, however, providing a much better solution, nForster, the internet but 100x better than you've ever known it. You now have the ability to view every web page as our Lord Forster intended.
